data.apiNameCn: 基于旅客姓名查询PNR列表
data.introduce: 该接口支持基于旅客姓名查询PNR列表，对应黑屏指令RTNM。
data.business: 该接口可根据旅客姓名查询Pnr列表，如果客人无法准确提供航班号, 航班日期,也可以按照旅客姓名检索到订座记录。支持模糊搜索。对应黑屏指令RTNM。
data.functions: 该接口支持使用旅客姓名（拼音或英文）进行模糊搜索。暂不支持中文姓名传入。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"pos","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"pseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"flightInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"passengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"airline","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"flightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"departureDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"起飞日期","children":[]},{"name":"flightSuffix","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航班后缀","children":[]},{"name":"classId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"销售舱位","children":[]},{"name":"arrivalAirport","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"到达机场代码识","children":[]}]}]
